com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster.actions

Class RoleDeterminationActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster.actions.RoleDeterminationActions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRoleDeterminationExternalActions

    public class RoleDeterminationActions
extends Object
implements IRoleDeterminationExternalActions
    Implementation of IRoleDeterminationExternalActions exposed by the HA context to the HA role determination state machine.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RoleDeterminationActions

        public RoleDeterminationActions(CatalysApplication application,
                                String applicationID,
                                INotifySupport eventNotifier,
                                IClusterDefinition clusterDefinition,
                                IClusterState clusterState,
                                boolean becomePrimaryWithoutLMAConfirmation,
                                boolean refreshStoresWhenBecomingPrimary,
                                List<IPrimaryValidityCheck> primaryValidityChecks,
                                List<IBecomingPrimaryAction> becomingPrimaryActions,
                                List<IRelinquishingPrimaryAction> relinquishingPrimaryActions,
                                IOperationInvoker roleConflictNotificationInvoker,
                                ISynchronizationController synchronizationController)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        application - the current application
        applicationID - the ID of the current application
        eventNotifier - an event notifier that will be used to notify listeners of role changes
        clusterDefinition - the definition of the current cluster
        clusterState - provides access to the state of the cluster
        becomePrimaryWithoutLMAConfirmation - tells whether we should become primary without a confirmation from the primary LMA that the primary process is dead
        refreshStoresWhenBecomingPrimary - If true, all stores will be re-read from disk before becoming primary
        primaryValidityChecks - the list of primary validity checks read from the configuration
        becomingPrimaryActions - the list of becoming-primary actions read from the configuration
        relinquishingPrimaryActions - the list of relinquishing-primary actions read from the configuration
        roleConflictNotificationInvoker - an IOperationInvoker used to notify remote cluster nodes when a role conflict is detected
        synchronizationController - an ISynchronizationController used to instruct the local cluster node to synchronize its data against other cluster nodes

    • Method Detail

      • executePrimaryActions

        public void executePrimaryActions()
        Actions to execute once the node has become primary. Unlike the other actions these actions are not configurable and are solely defined here, because of this, this operation is not part of the IRoleDeterminationExternalActions interface.

      • performPrimaryValidityChecks

        public boolean performPrimaryValidityChecks(Integer ipp)
        Primary validity checks. The result is computed as follows:
        • For each check specified in the configuration: does this check return true ?
          • Yes: continue
          • No: return false
        • Was there a primary before (i.e. is IP not null) ?
          • No: return true
          • Yes: can we reach its LMA ?
            • Yes: is the previous primary dead now ?
              • Yes: return true
              • No: Attempt to kill it
                • Success: return true
                • Failure: return false
            • No: does the configuration allow us to become primary anyway ?
              • Yes: return true
              • No: return false
        This implementation makes the assumption that all cluster nodes in the cluster have the same application ID, and therefore derives the JMX object name of the MBean on which to invoke the kill() operation from the current application ID.
        Specified by:
        performPrimaryValidityChecks in interface IRoleDeterminationExternalActions
        Parameters:
        ipp - the identity of the last known primary cluster node, null if there was no primary yet
        Returns:
        true iff. it is safe to take on the primary role
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if ip does not represent a known cluster node
        See Also:
        IRoleDeterminationExternalActions.performPrimaryValidityChecks(java.lang.Integer)

      • executeBecomingPrimaryActions

        public void executeBecomingPrimaryActions()
                                   throws BecomingPrimaryActionsFailedException
        • Executes the actions specified in the configuration. Any exception caught at this stage is wrapped in a BecomingPrimaryActionsFailedException.
        Specified by:
        executeBecomingPrimaryActions in interface IRoleDeterminationExternalActions
        Throws:
        BecomingPrimaryActionsFailedException - reports any failure in the execution of these actions
        See Also:
        IRoleDeterminationExternalActions.executeBecomingPrimaryActions()

      • executeRelinquishingPrimaryActions

        public void executeRelinquishingPrimaryActions()
                                        throws RelinquishingPrimaryActionsFailedException
        • Instructs the application to change to the ApplicationRunLevel.STAND_BY run-level. Any exception caught at this stage causes the application to commit suicide.
        • Publishes an event indicating that the local cluster node is no longer primary.
        • Executes the actions specified in the configuration. Any exception caught at this stage is wrapped in a RelinquishingPrimaryActionsFailedException.
        A failure in the execution of the primary stop actions is reported as a RelinquishingPrimaryActionsFailedException.
        Specified by:
        executeRelinquishingPrimaryActions in interface IRoleDeterminationExternalActions
        Throws:
        RelinquishingPrimaryActionsFailedException - reports any failure in the execution of these actions
        See Also:
        IRoleDeterminationExternalActions.executeRelinquishingPrimaryActions()

      • notifyRemoteNodeOfRoleConflict

        public void notifyRemoteNodeOfRoleConflict(Integer remoteNode)
        Description copied from interface: IRoleDeterminationExternalActions
        Notifies a remote node that a role conflict involving the local node and this remote node was detected.
        Specified by:
        notifyRemoteNodeOfRoleConflict in interface IRoleDeterminationExternalActions
        Parameters:
        remoteNode - the identity of the remote node to notify
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if remoteNode does not represent a known cluster node
        See Also:
        IRoleDeterminationExternalActions.notifyRemoteNodeOfRoleConflict(java.lang.Integer)
